title: Interpretation of seeing reading and listening to Surah Quraish in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing reading or listening to Surat Quraysh in a dream and seeing reading or listening to Surat Quraysh in a dream indicates an abundance of sustenance and a lot of goodness in the life of the dreamer, as seeing Surat Quraysh in a dream means getting rid of problems and returning life to calm and stability, as is shown in A man’s dream of collecting money, the interpretation of seeing or hearing Surat Quraysh in a dream is an image of Quraysh, a Meccan surah, one of the masterpieces of Mecca that was revealed to the Messenger, may God bless him and grant him peace. May the peace and blessings of God be upon him, and the verses of the Holy Surah in the middle of the thirty, which number four verses. Interpretation of seeing or hearing Surah Quraish in Manamasurah Quraish among its reciters, may God protect them from fear, or from those who yearn for goodness, or from those like them, is more beautiful for everyone. Or it provides you with a dignified life, so that you do not get bored. Or you earn a lot when you travel, Muhammad bin Shireen. One of the reciters of Surat Quraysh looks at the poor person with a look of mercy, and God loves the hearts of those who pray with him. The one who recites it is mentioned in Hajj as one of the sincere beneficiaries. Whoever finds himself in a dream reciting Surat Quraysh, it means that for the dreamer there is goodness, gifts, and an abundance of sustenance. Interpretation of a dream about reading Surat Quraysh by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin said that seeing Surat Quraysh in a dream has many benefits for whoever sees it, as if whoever sees it is seriously ill and sees himself in it. It is like reading Surat Quraysh in a dream, which indicates his recovery from many diseases and that he will pass this test. If a person suffers a lot in his life and sees himself reciting Surah Quraysh, this indicates that he will get rid of the problem and enjoy a calm, turbulent life. If the dreamer recites Surah Quraysh to his family, this indicates that the person fears the people of that household and loves them very much. Read also: Interpretation of the dream Seeing a white stone in a dream according to Ibn Sirin and Ibn Shaheen. Interpretation of seeing or hearing Surat Quraysh in a dream for one girl. The virgin girl watching the recitation of Surat Quraysh in her dream means that she was trying to get closer to God. Stay away from the sin she committed. Also, Surat Al-Qur’an in a dream protects her eyes from evil and jealousy. Read also: Interpretation of seeing or hearing Surat Al-Buruj in a dreamInterpretation of seeing or hearing Surat Quraysh in a dream by Ibn ShaheenSeeing Surat Quraysh in a dream will bring beauty, happiness, and maintenance to its owner, and his life will become better and better. But if the person is He suffers from multiple diseases and sees the image of Quraish on his nipple, this means that he will get rid of the disease and recover from it. If a young man sees Surah Quraish, it shows the talent and wisdom of a person. And if he has the right of inheritance, this indicates that he obtained this right of inheritance without difficulty or trouble. Read Surah Quraish in his dream indicates that he is a righteous person, who always tries to do good deeds, which also indicates that he is immune from the evil eye. If this vision is read to a person suffering from an illness, it means that he will recover and his anxiety will be relieved. When a married woman sees herself reading “Surat “Quraysh” can bring her many good things, and if she does not give birth, this indicates that God will respond to her and she will have good offspring. If a pregnant woman sees herself reading Surah Quraysh during her sleep, this means that she is praying to God for the safety of the child.

title: I dreamed that my brother had a daughter according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: I dreamed that my brother has a daughter.Having a daughter in a dream is one of the wonderful things that God gives to the pioneer that many good days are coming and he will have many good things in life. All the interpretations mentioned in the dream: My brother had a daughter in the dream... so follow us. I dreamed that my brother had a daughter. Seeing a brother giving birth to a baby girl in a dream symbolizes that the brother will gain great happiness and pleasure in life and will feel more comfortable and peaceful in his life in general. In the event that The dreamer sees in a dream that a brother has a daughter, then it will be interpreted that this brother will gain great joy and fulfill the dreams that he has arranged for a long time and will walk on the right path that will lead him to ambitions that he set for himself and worked hard to achieve success. When the dreamer sees that his brother has a daughter in a dream and that this brother has problems In fact, this symbolizes that he will be freed from the crises he faced and will receive many blessings in life, even feeling stable after a period of great sadness. If the fortuneteller sees that his unmarried brother has given birth to a beautiful girl in a dream, this is good news for a close marriage. From a girl who has good manners, respect and love, and he will be happy in marriage. Life with God’s help. The Asrar Dream Interpretation website is a website specialized in dream interpretation in the Arab world. Just type the Asrar Dream Interpretation website in Google and get the correct interpretations. I dreamed that my brother had a daughter by Ibn SirinImam Ibn Sirin explained that seeing a brother attracting a daughter in a dream symbolizes many good things that will happen in life soon, and he will gain many benefits in Life, and this makes him feel satisfied and calm in all his circumstances. Seeing that his brother Rizk gave birth to a girl in a dream is considered one of the new dreams that portends the brother beautiful things in life and tells him that he will achieve great profits in his worldly life and have good luck in all matters. When the dreamer sees that his brother Daughter in a dream and in reality suffers from the danger of debt, this vision symbolizes that the brother will help him get rid of the financial crisis in which he fell and will feed him generously even to everyone. His financial affairs are being tried and he gets the abundant money that he so desperately wants and his salvation from his troubles in life will be soon, God willing. I dreamed that my brother has a daughter and he is not married. Seeing a brother who has a daughter in a dream symbolizes that he is lucky and has many good things in his world and he is close to God is trying to do good and help those around him as much as possible. If the dreamer sees in a dream that his unmarried brother is giving birth to a girl, then it is fortunate that God will soon give him a beautiful girl to marry, and she will have many good qualities and they will live a quiet life, forming a large family and raising their children. On obedience to the Lord and love of goodness. When the dreamer sees that his brother gave birth to a beautiful girl while he is not married, this means that the brother will achieve many good and positive changes in his life and will receive many good things in the world and will be very happy. With this one

title: Interpretation of seeing a woman praying in a dream

preview.html: Prayer is one of the things that benefits a man in this world and the hereafter through good and good deeds, and today we are looking at a number of interpretations of seeing a woman praying in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a woman praying in a dream for a single woman: One of the dreams that a single woman sees in her dream is that there is a woman praying, so it has meanings. There are many different meanings, namely: Seeing an unmarried woman praying in her sleep and performing her rituals is great evidence that you will come to her. Seeing an unmarried woman praying and twining with some women behind her is a sign that she is preparing for the upcoming marriage. Seeing an unmarried woman in her dream praying in the twilight As she asks for rain, this is a sign of many problems that she faces in her life. If an unmarried girl prays in a dream, her vision indicates the date of her approaching wedding, with someone she loves and appreciates. Seeing a woman in a dream sitting on a prayer rug and wearing white clothes is a good vision. It indicates the goodness that is coming to that girl. As for the unmarried woman who sees her mother praying in her most beautiful way, this is evidence of her parents’ approval of her before their death, and her goodness. Interpretation of seeing a woman praying in a dream for a married woman: As for a married woman, she may see a woman praying while she is asleep in some of the following cases, which are: To dream of a married woman praying in a state of humility is a sign of goodness that will come to her. Physical and emotional stability. If a married woman sees a woman praying in her home, it is a sign that she will overcome obstacles and problems. Failure to complete prayer for a married woman is evidence of the problems and obstacles that fill her life. If a married woman is seen praying in the mosque and the two men are twins, this is evidence that she will die soon. If a married woman sees in her dream that she is praying at night and wearing white clothes, this indicates repentance from bad deeds. And a married woman praying in the mosque indicates her goodness and abundance of money. And seeing her going to the mosque Getting closer to God is evidence of her repentance for the sins she committed in her life. We chose for you: Interpretation of seeing praying in the mosque in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a woman praying in a dream for a divorced woman. Seeing a divorced woman in her sleep, and a woman praying or seeing herself praying in a dream, has indications, which we mention below: If a divorced woman sees in a dream a woman praying and sitting on the prayer rug, then this is a praiseworthy dream that indicates goodness that will come to her. Seeing a divorced woman praying and praying for goodness indicates a good condition for her and her children. When a divorced woman dreams that she is praying behind her ex-husband, this is considered a dream. It indicates her longing to return to her ex-husband. If a divorced woman sees in her dream that she is kneeling, this is evidence of staying away from sins and repenting for the past. While praying in a dream for a divorced woman, it may indicate closeness to God Almighty and a return to Him after a period of neglect of worship. The prayer of a divorced woman who prays Praying Tahajjud in a dream means increasing her obedience and getting closer to her Lord. Interpretation of seeing a woman praying in a dream for a pregnant woman: For a pregnant woman, if she dreams of a woman praying, there are some signs that indicate

title: Interpretation of a dream about cauliflower by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: A dream about cauliflower in a dream, the interpretation of a dream about cauliflower in a dream is one of the visions that can come to a person in a dream while searching for its interpretation. Seeing cauliflower in a dream is a benign vision that brings goodness. Scientists explained this because cauliflower is one of the foods that provides the body with the important nutrients it needs and also because of its green color, as green is the color in dreams. One of the colors that shows the good things. Broccoli indicates good health and important decisions. It also indicates successful achievements and projects in the dreamer’s life. Interpretation of a dream about cauliflower by Ibn Sirin. A dream about cauliflower in a dream was explained by the scholar Muhammad Ibn Sirin in his dream interpretation books, in which he published many interpretations of this vision, such as: Seeing cauliflower in a dream indicates the stability of life’s opinion, And that his family is in good condition. If the consciousness is a married woman and frying cauliflower in a dream, this means for her that she is in good health and that her financial situation will improve in the coming period. This vision also shows the student that he will get high grades in the test and shows him the extent of his academic excellence. Interpretation A girl’s dream of cauliflower. Scientists have mentioned many interpretations of this vision for an unmarried girl, which is what she sees in a dream. These interpretations are as follows: This vision is for an unmarried girl who is not engaged because the date of her engagement to a good man is approaching, and this vision is for an engaged girl whose wedding date is approaching. If a girl carries cauliflower in a dream, this means that she will face some problems or crises or will be delayed in marriage. If she eats If a girl buys cauliflower in a dream and it tastes delicious, it means that she will get a lot of nutrition. Seeing a girl studying cauliflower indicates success in studies and a high position among people. Interpretation of a dream about cauliflower for a married womanIf a married woman buys cauliflower in a dream, this means that she will receive a lot of things Good luck in the future. If a woman’s husband is the one who buys cauliflower in a dream and then gives it to his wife, this is evidence of the husband’s great kindness to the woman. If a married woman’s pregnancy is delayed and she sees cauliflower growing in her dream, this means that she will become pregnant in the future. Eating cauliflower in a dream indicates for a woman A married woman indicates the arrival of a new child or good luck. If she eats cauliflower in a dream and it does not taste good, this means for a married woman that some problems will arise. Interpretation of a dream about cauliflower in a dream for a pregnant womanIf the vision is that the pregnant woman is standing in the middle of a large group of cauliflower, then this It means that she will hear a lot of happy news. If a pregnant woman dreams of cauliflower in the markets and it is in good condition, this means that she will give birth to a male child and it will be a good boy, God willing. If a pregnant woman prepares cauliflower in a dream, this means for her that her married life is full It brings goodness and contentment and must be preserved until stability prevails in her life. Eating cauliflower in a pregnant woman’s dream shows her that her birth will be normal and easy.

title: Interpretation of dreams about killing my brother with a knife and his death in a dream and the most important indications of that for dream interpreters

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about slaughtering my brother with a knife and his death in a dream and its most important indicators for dream interpreters: the most stressful things that make the person worry and fear. Today, through the lines of our article, we will learn about them. Interpretation of a dream about killing my brother with a knife. Interpretation of a dream about killing my brother with a knife. Al-Nabulsi explained that seeing the dreamer slaughtering his brother in a dream is considered a form of A year of good dreams in real life, as it brings a lot of goodness to the dreamer in the near future, depending on the person who slaughters him, and it has many different interpretations, namely: Whoever feels anxious and distressed in real life and dreams that he is slaughtering his brother, this is a sign of the semi-comfort that he will feel. With it, which will lead to getting rid of his distress. It also indicates the dreamer’s sincere and righteous repentance, as he will be exposed to many sins and transgressions. If the dreamer sees that he is slaughtering his brother in a dream, and a sinner commits many sins, this indicates that his brother will be the first reason for his guidance and justice. See also: Interpretation of a dream of menstrual blood in a dream for a single, married, or pregnant woman by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream about killing one’s brother with a knife. There are many different interpretations that scientists have reached regarding slaughtering one’s brother with a knife in a dream, as this depends on the social status of the dreamer, in addition to the psychological state that he is going through. So, the interpretation of this for an unmarried girl is as follows: Ibn Sirin interpreted the dreamer’s vision of slaughtering someone in a dream, especially an unmarried girl, as a sign of his bad relations with people. As for slaughtering a member of her family, it is a sign of her great disobedience to her parents and harming them. If An unmarried girl saw in a dream the slaughter of a familiar person, then this indicates the date of her imminent marriage. Seeing one person slaughtered in a dream and shedding a lot of blood from him indicates that she is completely far from all the worship and corruption of her condition. If a person slaughters one girl, this is a sign that he He heard a lot of bad words about her and her family. Seeing someone slaughtering another person in a dream indicates the spread of sects and strife in the family to a large extent. An unmarried woman who slaughters herself in a dream is evidence of her bad intentions and morals. See also: Interpretation of a dream about a bullet in the chest in A dream for unmarried and pregnant women. Interpretation of dreams about slaughter without blood. There are many details that appear in the dream and greatly affect the acquisition of its correct interpretation, so the interpretation of seeing slaughter in a dream without seeing any blood comes as an indication of the relationship and dignity associated with others, and it also has a lot. Other indicators are: Slaughtering a person without blood in a dream shows the strong relationship and strong ties between people with each other. Slaughtering an animal in a dream without seeing blood is an indication of the obligation to pay zakat and charity. If the dreamer sees that he is slaughtering someone he knows, and no blood comes out, then this is evidence. On what the dreamer offers of kindness and kindness. As for seeing a believer slaughtering without blood, this is evidence of the obligation of charity and supplication. See also: Interpretation of a dream about agarwood oil in a dream by Ibn Sirin for unmarried women and

See also: Interpretation of a dream of a bullet in the chest in a dream for unmarried and pregnant women Interpretation of dreams of slaughter without blood There are many details that appear in the dream and affect Significantly on gaining its correct interpretation, so the interpretation of seeing slaughter in a dream without seeing any blood comes as an indication of the relationship and dignity associated with others, and it also has many other indications, which are: Slaughtering a person without blood in a dream shows the strong relationship and strong ties between people with each other. Slaughtering an animal in a dream without seeing blood is an indication of the necessity of paying zakat and charity. If the dreamer sees that he is slaughtering someone he knows, and no blood comes out, this is evidence of the kindness and charity that the dreamer offers. As for seeing the slaughter of a believer without blood, this is evidence of the necessity of charity and supplication. See also: Interpretation of a dream about oud oil in a dream by Ibn Sirin for unmarried women and

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing fishing in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about fishing in a dream, according to Ibn Sirin, means a dream about fishing in a dream, and it is one of the wonderful and important professions practiced by fishermen, and some see it as a hobby using a hook, and many see in their dreams that they are catching fish and want to interpret this dream. . Fishing shows good luck, good luck, a good life and a lot of money. Fishing shows hearing good news. Seeing a small fish more than a big fish shows more sadness than joy. Interpretation of a dream about fishing by Ibn Sirin: A dream about seeing fishing, Ibn Sirin interpreted the vision of fishing and has many clues Seeing a large catch indicates the benefit and goodness that the dreamer will receive in his life. It also shows the fulfillment of the dreamer’s desires in his life. Dream of fishing. Seeing a lot of fishing means that you will obtain lawful money and earn a living. Smooth fish skin indicates safety. Interpretation of a dream about searching About a single woman: Seeing fishing means goodness, benefit, and decent living. To dream of seeing fishing, fishing means that you will hear good news. Interpretation of a dream about large and small fishing: Seeing a small and large fishing together indicates the arrival of events full of sadness and happiness. Seeing a large catch is more Small catches are evidence that happy events are more than sad events. Seeing small fish more than large fish indicates more sadness than joy. Seeing a dead catch means that the dreamer realizes a certain thing. Interpretation of a dream about fishing from polluted water: To dream of fishing, Seeing fishing from polluted water indicates the occurrence of disasters in the dreamer’s life. Interpretation of a dream about fishing in fresh water: Seeing fishing from clean water indicates lawful living. It also indicates that he will obtain money and blessings. Interpretation of a dream about fishing in salt water: Seeing fishing in water indicates Salty indicates that the fortuneteller is wrong. Interpretation of a dream about fishing with a hook: Seeing a fish being caught and then eating it immediately indicates good news and will be heard from the good news. It also shows the dreamer’s awareness of what he wants in life. Interpretation of a dream about fishing by hand for a married woman. Seeing fishing in a dream for a married woman means Happiness and stability. If her husband is imprisoned, this indicates that she will be relieved and released from prison. Interpretation of a dream about fishing from cloudy waters in a dream. Whoever sees that he is catching fish from cloudy waters indicates that he will be exposed to difficulties and crises. It also indicates exposure to illness. It expresses his anxiety, sadness, and sorrow for Major.Interpretation of a dream about fishing with a hook in a dream. Whoever sees that he is catching a fish with a hook, this indicates that he will obtain lawful money. This vision also indicates that you will get a lot of money. Interpretation of a dream about fishing by hand for a married woman: Fishing for the dreamer portends many good things. And fishing by hand indicates On the prosperity and stability of married life. Interpretation of a dream about fishing by hand for a pregnant woman. The vision of fishing means good luck and abundant living. It also indicates comfort after fatigue and the health of the newborn. Fishing easily and the fish coming out indicates an easy birth for the pregnant woman. Interpretation of a dream about fishing by hand for a pregnant woman indicates that she will soon have a baby. Sustenance.

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a barber and shaving

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about the barber and shaving in a dream: Whoever dreams of seeing a barber in his house and asking him to prepare to cut his hair, this is a sign of great livelihood for the viewer. Everyone who sees the barber asking to leave the house in a dream is a sign of the end of the problems and disputes that pervade the dreamer’s house. The meaning of the barber leaving the house When one dreams of a barber in his house in a dream and he goes out and takes Something with him, then this is a sign that problems will arise, but they will end in a short time. Seeing the barber smiling in a dream shows profit and profit. The meaning of seeing a barber in a young man’s dream. A young man is seen in a dream of a barber as a sign of kindness and sustenance. When a young man sees that the barber has risen, he shaves his head during his sleep, a sign of The dreamer is freed from his crises. As for who dreams of being a barber? Singing and dancing in his dream is a sign of an approaching crisis in the life of the dreamer. Seeing a barber for a girl in a dream. An unmarried girl who dreams of seeing a barber in her home proposes to her. It is a sign that there is a man who loves her very much and wants to marry her and confess his love to her. The barber In a single home, it is a sign of happy events. Whoever sees a barber crying and his tears falling in her house is a sign of kindness and nourishment. As for a woman who dreams of a barber eating and drinking in her house, this is a sign of the health of her family. A barber for a married and divorced woman in a dream. A barber in a dream for a married woman is a sign of happiness and pleasure. Any person. He sees someone she knows in a dream turning into a barber, then the vision is a good possibility for a big change in her life for the better. As for seeing her husband turning into a barber, this indicates that he will change for the better and be more loyal and loving towards her. The barber in a dream symbolizes the divorced woman’s earning of livelihood and hope. If he shaves the hair of the divorced woman This is a sign of the end of her problems. The meaning of seeing a barber for a pregnant woman in a dream. The symbol of the barber in the pregnant woman’s home for easy delivery. Eating the barber’s food in the pregnant woman’s home indicates following a broad diet. Whoever sees the barber drinking from his bottle shows her giving birth to a healthy child. Add the dream you would like to interpret with Refer to your marital status in a comment below the article, and we will respond to it and clarify it.

title: Interpretation of the dream of seeing embers in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq

preview.html: Embers are burning pieces of fire. The dream of embers is one of the real and strange dreams that the dreamer always sees in his general life. Embers are one of the symbols of fire and were formed after fire was found in wood and other tools that turned into embers, and we can understand them in dreams in their various forms and meanings. Interpretation of a dream Seeing coal in a dream and seeing coal in a dream. There are many indicators and signs that can prove that it is good, some of which are evidence of unpredictable things, seeing a married woman against a married woman, and dreams of celibacy and ashes and ashes differ in interpretations of pregnancy, and there are also interpretations for single people and married men, explaining dreams of charcoal by hand and seeing charcoal He eats, and dreams of being burned with embers. There are embers in the dream. He buys embers in a dream, and extinguishes the charcoal fire. Seeing charcoal in a dream indicates money, but it is measured and calculated. Coal indicates something useful, and knowledge and effort to collect it, because it indicates the ease of obtaining it. Food.Interpretation of seeing embers by Ibn SirinI saw in my dream that embers are evidence of earning a livelihood and profits without context. Frozen hallucinations in dreams often indicate patience and resistance to the difficulties and problems you face. Ibn Sirin, who had dreams in his dreams, said that this indicates the presence of problems And the end of disputes between people. The dream interpretation of seeing embers by hand in a dream explains the value and morals of the Prophet. The interpretation of a person dreaming of ashes is evidence of the problems and fears he went through, which sometimes show that he is unfair. The interpretation of seeing embers in the house in a dream is evidence of many blessings. And blessings. We light embers and cook in dreams, which means suffering and disagreements between people. Also follow: Interpretation of a dream about seeing charcoal in a dream by Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi, and Ibn Shaheen. Interpretation of a dream about charcoal for a single woman. Seeing a lonely girl in a dream walking among embers, but she does not burn to death, means That many consequences have been overcome, because it also shows strong will and failure. If she finds herself walking on hot coals and feels pain in her dream, this is a sign of her ability to recover from illness and deal with problems. Seeing coals in a woman’s dream means that a young man is trying to get close to her There are many challenges to achieving this goal. Interpretation of a dream about eating charcoal in a dream proves that the girl committed some crimes and faced serious difficulties in facing the pressures of life. Explain the dreams of embers for one dreaming woman, which indicates that she used her body to spread peace. Interpretation of seeing embers for a married womanThe vision A married woman walking without ashes in her dreams indicates that she has a strong personality and can face the difficulties and problems she faces. Seeing someone walking on an ash tree in a dream at a wedding will save him from some troubles. A dream of a married woman walking in ashes with her husband in a dream indicates Until some incidents threatened their marriage, but they quickly got rid of it. The interpretation of married women eloping in their dreams of married women is evidence of income.

title: Interpretation of a dream about hearing news of the death of a husband

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about hearing news of the death of a husband. Hearing the news of death means prolonging life and enjoying good health. It can indicate drastic and positive changes to the viewer. Death is a state in which an organism permanently stops growth, metabolism, and important functional activities (such as breathing, eating, drinking, thinking, exercising, and all important activities), and the body cannot recover and death in a dream can indicate goodness and transition to a better life and repentance of sins, It can indicate a bad situation, problems, and fears. Dreaming of hearing the news of the death of Ibn Shaheen’s husband. The death of the husband in a dream indicates the husband’s long life and health, or the husband’s lack of obedience and obedience, or the deterioration of his condition. Seeing a pregnant woman dreaming that she heard the news of the death of her husband, and this indicates that her husband is far away. About obedience and performance of worship, and therefore this dream presents a warning message to her husband to review all his circumstances and actions, and return to her. God's way. God willing, it may be a reference to the birth of a son, and God knows best. But if the husband sees the death of his wife in his sleep, this is evidence of his good fortune and benefit, and this is good news for him. When the wife’s death is not accompanied by a funeral, this may portend great profits and advantages, while The death of the wife, the funeral, and the screaming and wailing are the opposite. It portends great losses and troubles, and God knows best. A widow’s vision of her husband’s death and dying appears in her dream and means good news for him about marrying again. However, if a widow’s vision of her husband’s death in a dream is accompanied by screaming and wailing, then this portends bad news. But if a girl sees An unmarried woman sees her lover or fiancé in a dream and hears the news of his death, then this indicates that this is a sign of doom and separation from each other, and God knows best. If a married woman hears the news of her husband’s death, this indicates that she has many fears, anxieties, and unpleasant news in her life. And this vision It portends the death of the dreamer, and God knows best. Hearing the news of someone’s death may mean hearing good news. Seeing the death of a living person indicates changes and developments in his life that may be for the better. Through the collapse of problems and getting rid of obstacles. Dreaming of hearing the news of the death of Ibn Sirin’s husband. Seeing hearing the news of the death A stranger indicates abundant sustenance and abundant goodness for the dreamer. Also, hearing the news of the death of a stranger suggests that he will get rid of the troubles and problems that haunted his sleep. Reconsidering the death of a person and mourning him may foretell the death of another person in the family. If he saw the death of this person and cried quietly This indicates solace after distress and the death of worry and anguish. Seeing a person dying with tears means hearing good news. To dream that you hear the news of someone’s death in a dream and then cry over him means comfort after fatigue and positive feelings. It indicates peace of mind and spacious living. The vision also indicates recovery from illness.If this person is suffering from any illness. This vision can also indicate longevity and good health. Dreaming of hearing the news of the death of a husband in Nabulus: Dreaming that you hear the news of the death of your husband in a dream and then crying over him, this indicates peace of mind and nourishment.
